MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL29 postcode area of Colwyn Bay, affecting properties in Dolwen Road, Geulan Road, Bwlch Y Gwynt Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:55pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:25pm on 3rd March 2021.
